About universAAL Ontology Suite

Set of ontologies used within universAAL

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL Ontology for ISO 11073-10471 Sensors Ontological representation of sensors specified in ISO 11073 - Part 10471 (Independent living activity hub)
universAAL Ontology ASOR Set of ontologies used within universAAL
universAAL Ontology Audio - Video The upper ontology defining the most general concepts from the audio and video world.
universAAL Ontology Context History Entrepot Ontology for the services that manage Context History
universAAL Ontology Continua Health Alliance managers Continua Health Manager ontology
universAAL Ontology Cryptographic The Cryptographic Ontology, offering a base model of cryptograpic algorithms, techniques and services
universAAL Ontology Dependability The dependability ontology defining the concepts for realibility and fault tolerance.
universAAL Ontology Devices The Collection of Devices Ontology
universAAL Ontology Drools Set of ontologies used within universAAL
universAAL Ontology Furniture An ontology for describing furnitures in a home environment.
universAAL Ontology Gesture Pointing The ontology for gesture pointing.
universAAL Ontology for hand gestures Ontology that describes different hand gestures, based on Kinect DTW project: http://kinectgesture.codeplex.com/
universAAL Ontology for Diseases Set of ontologies used within universAAL
universAAL Ontology for Health Measurements Description of biomedical measurements for health aspects
universAAL Ontology HVAC The Collection of Hvac Ontology
universAAL Ontology User Impairment Set of ontologies used within universAAL
universAAL Ontology Languages Ontology for languages based on ISO 639 codes (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes)
universAAL Ontology Lighting The ontology defining the most general concepts dealing with light sources and their control.
universAAL Ontology Measurement The ontology defining the most general concepts dealing with measurement.
universAAL Ontology Multimedia Devices Ontology for multimedia devices, displays and equipment
universAAL Ontology for personal health devices Ontological representation of personal health devices (Continua certified devices), e.g. blood pressure monitor, weighing scale,...
universAAL Ontology Physical World The upper ontology defining the most general concepts from the physical world as opposed to the virtual realm.
universAAL Ontology Profiling Set of ontologies used within universAAL
universAAL Ontology Contact List Profile -
universAAL Ontology for Health Health Profile
universAAL Ontology User Interaction Main Menu Profile Set of ontologies used within universAAL
universAAL Ontology User Interaction Preferences Profile User Interaction preferences of a User inspired by ETSI ES 746 standard (Personalization and user profile management - User Profile Preferences and Information), ISO IEC 24751-2 (Information technology ? Individualized adaptability and accessibility in e-learning, education and training ??Access for all? personal needs and preferences for digital delivery)
universAAL Ontology Questionnaire a model for Questionnaire creation and managing
universAAL Ontology Reasoning Ontology for the generic situation reasoner
universAAL Ontology Unit The Unit Ontology
universAAL Ontology x73 devices Ontology for devices based on ISO 11073 devices/model (health device communication) for the universAAL middleware
universAAL Ontology Additional Device Concepts Set of ontologies used within universAAL
universAAL Ontology Recommendations Recommendations to be used by the apps in order to give tips to the UIHandlers in order to better show the content to the User
universAAL Ontology Security Security concepts and service definition.
universAAL Ontology System Info Description of AAL Space-related events
universAAL Ontology Composite Set of ontologies used within universAAL
universAAL Ontology Karaf Feature Set of ontologies used within universAAL
